name: HITMAN 2 - Upgrade Pack
description:
The HITMAN™ 2 Upgrade Pack is for those who have already tried HITMAN™ 2 - Miami Pack, and want more. The Upgrade Pack gives you full access to the entire HITMAN™ 2 Standard Edition, including four full locations and weekly content updates, in addition to Hawke's Bay and Miami.

Travel the globe and track your targets across exotic sandbox locations in HITMAN™ 2. From sun-drenched streets to dark and dangerous rainforests, nowhere is safe from the world's most creative assassin, Agent 47.
